front.title: Open Grid Protocol: Introduction and Requirements

abstract.t: The Open Grid Protocol (OGP) defines interactions between hosts whichcollaborate to create an shared, internet scale virtual worldexperience. This document introduces the protocol, the objectives itattempts to achieve and requirements it imposes on systems and usersutilizing the protocol. This document also describes the modelassumed by the protocol (to the extent it affects protocolinteractions.)
